long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Constantly pointing out things on your screen to customers, clients, and coworkers? 

Jelli is the FASTEST way to annotate a screenshot and paste it anywhere. Hit a hotkey (cmd + shift + s), drag with your mouse to draw, then cmd + v to paste wherever you need.

Great for:
- Explaining things to customers
- Documenting proposals
- Highlighting bugs 
- And much more!

Currently only works on the Google Chrome browser.
